Town Crier, a smart contract oracle system developed in part by Cornell Tech and Cornell University faculty, was acquired by @chainlink  https://t.co/p8Iiis3SxD

Chainlink acquired @Cornell #TownCrier, the first and only #TEE that's able to work with #SmartContracts. All further development will be done by the Chainlink team. All those partners of #IC3, that are stepping into the SmartContract game, will be forwarded to #Chainlink
